title: PHPuseKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPuseKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
trait message1 {
public function msg1() {
echo 
  "OOP is fun! ";
}
}
class Welcome {
use 
  message1;
}
$obj = new Welcome();
$obj->msg1();
?>

practice_exercises.description: Fill in the missing line to make this code work.
practice_exercises.starter_code:
<?php

  "OOP is fun! ";
}
}
# TODO: Complete this line
use 
  message1;
}
$obj = new Welcome();
$obj->msg1();

practice_exercises.solution:
<?php
trait message1 {
public function msg1() {
echo 
  "OOP is fun! ";
}
}
class Welcome {
use 
  message1;
}
$obj = new Welcome();
$obj->msg1();
?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPuseKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPuseKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPuseKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
